title: Why Partner With Whiteboard Consultants For Your US Education?
description: As the top study in USA consultants in Kolkata, we provide tailored guidance to help you navigate the competitive US admissions landscape and secure a place at your dream university.

features.text: In-depth knowledge of the Common App and university-specific application portals.
Personalized guidance for crafting compelling personal essays and supplements.
Expert preparation for standardized tests like SAT, ACT, GRE, GMAT, IELTS & TOEFL.
High success rate for F-1 student visa applications with rigorous mock interview prep.
Specialized advice for securing admission into competitive STEM and business programs.
End-to-end support from university shortlisting to pre-departure.

image.alt: A team of education consultants collaborating on study in the USA applications
